name: Rise of One
detailed_description:
After armies of Aida defeated Uonos at the midst of the main continent
a rift is opened through curse and pulls in any travelling soul to fight for eternity.
Mages, Rangers, Warriors and any fool to cross the path of curiosity ends up in the arena.

Rise of One is a King of the Hill style game where you will be
faced against seven, blood seeking, individuals as your opponent in the Rift of Uonos.

short_description:
Rise of One is a King of the Hill style game where you will be
faced against seven, blood seeking, individuals as your opponent in the Rift of Uonos.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, French, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™i5-2500 @ 3.3 GHZ / AMD FX-8320 @ 3.5ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
